description: The ADVERSE_EVENT_INFO table contains information about adverse event records for a patient.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adverse event record.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study associated with this adverse event.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ATTRIBUTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the attribution level of the associated research study to this adverse event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unrelated


Unlikely


Possible


Probable


Definite

columns.name: SERIOUS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this adverse event is considered serious.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: EXPECTED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this adverse event is expected.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SERIOUS_YN

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the diagnosis record containing information about the term associated with this adverse event.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the status of this adverse event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record containing the comments for this adverse event.

columns.name: RESOLVED_DATE
columns.description: The date this adverse event was resolved.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ATTR_NOT_COLL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the attribution for the associated research study was collected for this adverse event. 'Y' indicates that an attribution was not collected. 'N' or NULL indicate that an attribution was collected.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SERIOUS_YN

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study association that has been linked to this adverse event. Linking an adverse event to a research study association means the adverse event may be related to or caused by the research study.
